global: Maintains trigger words that will fire pre-determined responses. Can be set to only respond occasionally.
addtriggers: Adds a trigger word(s) with a chance of responding with a phrase to an existing response.
edit: Modifys the text and chance for the response or trigger.
remove: Removes either a trigger or a respond.
Removing a respond removes ALL triggers. Likewise, removing the only trigger for a response, removes the response.
list: {{!}}returns a haste url containing all responses and triggers in DB
